member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.PolicyInjection.PolicyInjection
member.summary: A static facade class that provides the main entry point into the Policy Injection Application Block. Methods on this class create intercepted objects, or wrap existing instances with interceptors.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.PolicyInjection.PolicyInjection.Create``1(System.Object[])
member.summary: Creates a new object of type and adds interception as needed to match the policies specified in the default policy configuration.
member.param: Arguments to pass to the constructor.
member.returns: The intercepted object (or possibly a raw instance if no policies apply).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.PolicyInjection.PolicyInjection.Create``1(Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Common.Configuration.IConfigurationSource,System.Object[])
member.summary: Creates a new object of type and adds interception as needed to match the policies specified in the policy configuration supplied in .
member.param: containing the policy configuration.
Arguments to pass to the constructor.
member.returns: The intercepted object (or possibly a raw instance if no policies apply).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.PolicyInjection.PolicyInjection.Create``2(System.Object[])
member.summary: Creates a new object of type and adds interception as needed to match the policies specified in the default policy configuration.
member.typeparam: Type of reference to return. Must be an interface the object implements.
member.param: Arguments to pass to the constructor.
member.returns: The intercepted object (or possibly a raw instance if no policies apply).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.PolicyInjection.PolicyInjection.Create``2(Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Common.Configuration.IConfigurationSource,System.Object[])
member.summary: Creates a new object of type and adds interception as needed to match the policies specified in the policy configuration supplied in .
member.typeparam: Type of reference to return. Must be an interface the object implements.
member.param: containing the policy configuration.
Arguments to pass to the constructor.
member.returns: The intercepted object (or possibly a raw instance if no policies apply).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.PolicyInjection.PolicyInjection.Wrap``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a proxy for the given object that adds interception policies as defined in the default configuration source.
member.remarks: Despite the name of the parameter, this may be any type that the instance is assignable to, including both interfaces that it implements and the concrete type of the object.
member.typeparam: Type of the proxy to return.
member.param: Instance object to wrap.
member.returns: The proxy for the instance, or the raw object if no policies apply.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.PolicyInjection.PolicyInjection.Wrap``1(Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Common.Configuration.IConfigurationSource,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a proxy for the given object that adds interception policies as defined in .
member.remarks: Despite the name of the parameter, this may be any type that the instance is assignable to, including both interfaces that it implements and the concrete type of the object.
member.typeparam: Type of the proxy to return.
member.param: containing the policy configuration.
Instance object to wrap.
member.returns: The proxy for the instance, or the raw object if no policies apply.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.PolicyInjection.Properties.Resources.CouldNotFindPolicyInConfiguration

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.PolicyInjection.Properties.Resources.ExceptionAttributeNoSubclassOfAttribute
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Type must be a subclass of System.Attribute..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.PolicyInjection.Properties.Resources.InterceptionNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The type {0} is not interceptable..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.PolicyInjection.Properties.Resources.NoHandlersInPolicy
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The policy {0} does not have any handlers..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.PolicyInjection.Properties.Resources.PlaceholderRule
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This rule is not intended to be used directly. Use the rules from the Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Interception assembly instead..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.PolicyInjection.Properties.Resources.PolicyInjectionSectionNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The configuration section for Policy Injection cannot be found in the configuration source..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.PolicyInjection.Properties.Resources.TracePoliciesApplied
